short_summary: One (1) IT Security Design Specialist level 3 to support maintain and update current DFAT technical C6 environment.",

full_summary:
# Tender Notice

## TBIPS – C.7 - One (1) IT Security Design Specialist Level 3

### Notice Type

Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS).

### Solicitation Information

* Solicitation Number: 23-236581
* Reference Number: 23-236581
* Solicitation Date: 2023-03-15
* Closing Date: 2023-04-06 14:00:00

### Contracting Entity

* Contracting Entity Name (English): Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (Department of)
* Contracting Entity Name (French): Affaires étrangères, du commerce et du développement (Ministère des)
* Address: 125 Sussex Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0G2, Canada

### Tender Description

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) requires the services of one (1) IT Security Design Specialist Level 3 to support, maintain, and update the current DFATD technical C6 environment. The IT Security Design Specialist must ensure the service meets established standards of quality, including reliability, usability, and performance for secret end-user devices and certified peripherals.

### Term of the Contract

* Estimated duration: 24 months
* Option periods: two (2) periods of 12 months each
* Anticipated start date: 2023-05-01
* Estimated delivery date: 2025-04-30

### Contract Requirements

* The contractor must meet the requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP)
* The contractor must have a Secret security clearance
* The contractor must comply with the rules and regulations of the TBIPS Supply Arrangement

### Inquiries

Inquiries regarding this RFP must be submitted to the Contracting Authority, Betty Woodman, at betty.woodman@international.gc.ca.

### Documents and References

* Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be emailed directly from the Contracting Authority to Qualified Supply Arrangement Holders
* Bidders are advised that "buyandsell.gc.ca" is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents.

### Trade Agreements

The contract is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government
